${ModID}:Conflaguration.NAME: Conflaguration

${ModID}:FlamingLeap.NAME: Flaming Leap
${ModID}:FlamingLeap.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Consume a card to Gain [E] and draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.
